movie.title: The House on Sorority Row
movie.description_intro: A group of girls staying at a sorority house clash with the house's owner, who wants them out. They decide to play a prank on her, but it goes awry and she winds up dead. Panicking, the girls try to hide the body, but someone (or something) witnessed the crime and begins to stalk them.
movie.description_full: A group of girls staying at a sorority house clash with the house's owner, who wants them out. They decide to play a prank on her, but it goes awry and she winds up dead. Panicking, the girls try to hide the body, but someone (or something) witnessed the crime and begins to stalk them.

movies.title: Curious George: Go West, Go Wild
movies.title_english: Curious George: Go West, Go Wild
movies.title_long: Curious George: Go West, Go Wild (2020)
movies.summary: Curious George is back in the saddle and ready for adventure in his exciting movie-Go West, Go Wild. George and Ted travel to cousin Ginny's farm for a relaxing outdoor weekend, but plans take a turn when her farm animals escape into the wild blue yonder. With the help of Emmett, a friendly farmhand with cowboy dreams, the group sets out to track the herd through the countryside, camp outdoors, fish for their dinner, and stumble into a ghost town. Featuring a spirited new score and original songs, this unforgettable story proves that anything is possible when you believe in yourself.

Featuring a spirited new score and original songs, this unforgettable story proves that anything is possible when you believe in yourself.

movies.title: Hangar 18
movies.summary: Shortly after the launch of a satellite from a space shuttle the satellite collides with a UFO in front of the crew's eyes. Because of an election campaign some politicians try to hide the crashed UFO -- inside hangar 18.
movies.description_full: Shortly after the launch of a satellite from a space shuttle the satellite collides with a UFO in front of the crew's eyes. Because of an election campaign some politicians try to hide the crashed UFO -- inside hangar 18.

movies.title: Top Knot Detective
movies.summary: This is the story of how a failed Japanese samurai series became an instant cult classic.
movies.description_full: This is the story of how a failed Japanese samurai series became an instant cult classic.
movies.synopsis: This is the story of how a failed Japanese samurai series became an instant cult classic.

movies.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
movies.summary: A shuddering exorcism spins out of control and claims the life of a young girl. Months later, while working the night shift at the hospital morgue, Megan Reed receives a disfigured corpse. Alone and locked in the corridors of the cold basement, she starts to experience hair-raising visions, which lead her to suspect that the dead body delivered that night is possessed by a ruthless evil entity.
